评论概述: Beautiful, flattering dress for a price that can't be beat! (White, S size)
评论详情: Shopping for a simple Mass ceremony dress for my upcoming wedding, and wanted something simple yet chic. The sweetheart neckline is to die for. The material is actually thicker than I expected, with medium stretch, so very forgiving. I'm 5'4", 124 lbs, 34A cup. I initially bought a medium, but it was too big in the hips and waist. The small fit like a glove. The little shawl is adorable, but a little difficult to do the button (perhaps of my fat fingers? lol). The skirt has a bit of flair; you may be able to get away without a petticoat with the fit-n-flare silhouette. the white is a big see-through though, so will be wearing a nude or white strapless corset. Overall can't beat the price for such an adorable dress! Happy shopping!
Super cute, but the small fits like a 4-6, so if your a 0-2/XS it’ll be too loose. Great feeling material and super cute.

评论概述: Best dress ever! For cosplay or cocktails
评论详情: I ordered this dress to help me launch a World War II podcast and it fit like a dream with an adorable petticoat underneath it and I cannot tell you how many compliments I have received! I would also wear it with or without those little capelet to any cocktail party ever. It's elegant and timeless.
It split down the back when I bent over so ended up wearing a red blazer over it. I LOVE this dress but I am so disappointed that it split like that.

I love the older styled dresses and this is no exception. I do wish there was another layer under the dress to help with the feel of the material, but it's flowy enough for you not to notice most of the time!

I bought this in black to wear to a 1940s themed party and got a gazillion complements.  Fabric has good stretch, so take that into consideration when picking out your size. I got a medium because my limiting dimension was my waist, but I should have really gotten a small to better fit the bust area (I'm small busted relative to my other dimensions). I feel the dress would have stretched to fit my waist and fit my bust more snug.  The skirt portion is awesome, I wore it with a petticoat to fill it out (and keep me warm).  I absolutely loved the capelet, but be forewarned, it likes to spin around if you are someone who moves a lot. I had friends constantly adjusting it for me to keep it straight.  I feel like this is now my go to black dress for all types of event!

I took a gamble on this dress but it was a big win for me. The dress has stretch to it so sizing is really easy/flexible but it was true to size. It was so comfortable and hugged all the right spots for a really nice fitted look without being uncomfortable or showing off any problem areas. I never get dresses this awesome or fit so well when I shop online - definitely a dress lottery moment there. The dress is perfect as-is, but would also look great if you wanted something casual without the cape and it is not attached. Would go great with a petticoat under it too, but it had enough flare for me without. I ordered red and it is a perfect red, not washed out in an orange hue or anything. I think this is my new favorite dress.
I was pleasantly surprised by the quality of this product based on the price. I will definitely be wearing this again.
Fir super well, comfy stretchy material and just super cute in general

I purchased 5 new dresses for a wedding I was attending and this was the clear winner. I modeled the new outfits in addition to a few options from my closet and my husband chose this dress immediately. Each new dress I put on was a quick "I liked the first one better!" I honestly didn't have high hopes considering Amazon seems to be carrying very cheaply made items at pretty high prices, but I'm so glad I took a chance on this dress. The dress is flattering and different in appearance from anything I have seen in department stores lately. I received many compliments while wearing it, I just adore it. My only complaint is the material. It's a real *pita* to get the wrinkles out of. I used an iron and a pressing cloth to remove the DEEP wrinkles this dress arrived with which took forever and then wanted to scream later on in the evening when I realized the dress had wrinkled just from the way I sat and bent in it throughout the night. So, it's a fussy dress due to the cheap material. It doesn't look cheap on though, don't let it deter you from purchasing.
